article: bomb-making chemicals discovered by police in a truck driven by a suspected member of the basque separatist group eta were intended to explode in madrid and could have caused a `` massacre , '' justice minister jose maria michavila said sunday .
abstract: officials say they have foiled eta plot to set off bomb in madrid
